sendcrock.text: Dear @,^Remember the whole family used to make kimchi during the winter back home? ^I'm sending you this crock so you can make delicious kimchi out of fresh veges!^ -Mom
kimchifriedrice.text: I almost forgot! ^I bet you've been craving for this!^ -Mom
kimchitunastew.text: Nothing can beat the spicy hearty broth during the cold winter day. ^Always get yourself warm @!^ -Mom
